languages.text: "Неужели вы могли подумать, что какие-то служки справятся с переворотом? Высшие чины повинны не меньше — мои стражи перебили друг друга лишь потому, что подозревали в рядом стоящем предателя. Но во главе... Во главе бунта стоят самые приближенные к госпоже".

traits.locale_text: "Неужели вы могли подумать, что какие-то служки справятся с переворотом? Высшие чины повинны не меньше — мои стражи перебили друг друга лишь потому, что подозревали в рядом стоящем предателя. Но во главе... Во главе бунта стоят самые приближенные к госпоже".

languages.text: "Did you really think mere servants could plan a coup? The senior officers are just as guilty, half of my guards butchered one another because they suspected treason. As for the real culprit... The coup was staged by those closest to the mistress."
languages.original_text: "Неужели вы могли подумать, что какие-то служки справятся с переворотом? Высшие чины повинны не меньше — мои стражи перебили друг друга лишь потому, что подозревали в рядом стоящем предателя. Но во главе... Во главе бунта стоят самые приближенные к госпоже".

traits.locale_text: "Did you really think mere valets could prepare a coup? The senior officers are just as guilty, half of my guards butchered one another because they suspected treason. As for the real culprit... The coup was staged by someone closest to the mistress."

"Did you really think mere valets could prepare a coup? The senior officers are just as guilty, half of my guards butchered one another because they suspected treason. As for the real culprit... The coup was staged by someone closest to the mistress."

"Did you really think mere servants could prepare a coup? The senior officers are just as guilty, half of my guards butchered one another because they suspected treason. As for the real culprit... The coup was staged by those closest to the mistress."

"Did you really think mere servants could plan a coup? The senior officers are just as guilty, half of my guards butchered one another because they suspected treason. As for the real culprit... The coup was staged by those closest to the mistress."

"Did you really think mere servants could plan a coup? The senior officers are just as guilty, half of my guards butchered one another because they suspected treason. As for the real culprit... The coup was staged by those closest to the mistress."

"Did you really think mere servants could plan a coup? The senior officers are just as guilty, half of my guards butchered one another because they suspected treason. As for the real culprit... The coup was staged by those closest to the mistress."

languages.text: «¿De verdad creía que unos simples sirvientes tramaron el ataque? Los oficiales superiores son igual de culpables, pues la mitad de mis guardias se mataron entre sí porque sospechaban que alguno de ellos los había traicionado. El verdadero culpable se encuentra entre los individuos más cercanos a la señora».
languages.original_text: "Did you really think mere servants could plan a coup? The senior officers are just as guilty, half of my guards butchered one another because they suspected treason. As for the real culprit... The coup was staged by those closest to the mistress."

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad creía que unos simples sirvientes tramaron el ataque? Los oficiales superiores son igual de culpables, pues la mitad de mis guardias se mataron entre sí porque sospechaban que alguno de ellos los había traicionado. El verdadero culpable se encuentra entre los individuos más cercanos a la señora».

languages.text: "Dachtet Ihr wirklich, bloße Diener könnten einen Coup planen? Die hochrangigen Offiziere sind ebenso schuldig. Die Hälfte meiner Wachen hat sich gegenseitig abgeschlachtet, weil sie einander des Hochverrats verdächtigt haben. Und was den wahren Täter angeht ... Der Coup wurde von denen eingefädelt, die der Herrin am nächsten stehen."
languages.original_text: "Did you really think mere servants could plan a coup? The senior officers are just as guilty, half of my guards butchered one another because they suspected treason. As for the real culprit... The coup was staged by those closest to the mistress."

traits.locale_text: "Dachtet Ihr wirklich, bloße Diener könnten einen Coup vorbereiten? Die hochrangigen Offiziere sind ebenso schuldig. Die Hälfte meiner Wachen hat sich gegenseitig abgeschlachtet, weil sie einander des Hochverrats verdächtigt haben. Und was den wahren Täter angeht ... Der Coup wurde von denen eingefädelt, die der Herrin am nächsten stehen."

languages.text: « Vous pensez vraiment que de vulgaires serviteurs auraient pu fomenter un coup d'État ? Les officiers supérieurs sont tout aussi coupables, la moitié de mes gardes a massacré l'autre pour des soupçons de trahison. Quant aux véritables coupables... Tout a été organisé par l'entourage proche de ma maîtresse. »
languages.original_text: "Did you really think mere servants could plan a coup? The senior officers are just as guilty, half of my guards butchered one another because they suspected treason. As for the real culprit... The coup was staged by those closest to the mistress."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pensez vraiment que de vulgaires serviteurs auraient pu fomenter un coup d'État ? Les officiers supérieurs sont tout aussi coupables, la moitié de mes gardes a massacré l'autre pour des soupçons de trahison. Quant aux véritables coupables... Tout a été organisé par l'entourage proche de ma maîtresse. »

languages.text: “您真的认为，仅仅靠这群仆人能就发动政变吗？那些高级官员也同样参与其中。我手下一半卫兵开始自相残杀，因为他们互相怀疑对方是叛乱分子。至于真正的罪魁祸首……这场政变是平日离女主人最近的那些人发起的。”
languages.original_text: "Did you really think mere servants could plan a coup? The senior officers are just as guilty, half of my guards butchered one another because they suspected treason. As for the real culprit... The coup was staged by those closest to the mistress."

traits.locale_text: “您真的认为，仅仅靠这群仆人能就发动政变吗？那些高级官员也同样参与其中。我手下一半卫兵开始自相残杀，因为他们互相怀疑对方是叛乱分子。至于真正的罪魁祸首……这场政变是平日离女主人最近的那些人发起的。”

languages.text: 「一介の従者がクーデターを計画できるなどと本気で思ってるのか？上級士官だって同罪だ。反逆罪を疑って、我が衛兵の半数は殺し合いになった。真犯人はというと…主に最も近い人間が、クーデターを引き起こしたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Did you really think mere servants could plan a coup? The senior officers are just as guilty, half of my guards butchered one another because they suspected treason. As for the real culprit... The coup was staged by those closest to the mistress."

traits.locale_text: 「一介の従者がクーデターを準備できるなど本当にお思いか？上級士官も同じく罪を犯している。反逆罪を疑って、我が兵士の半数は殺し合いになったよ。真犯人はというと…主に最も近い人間が、クーデターを引き起こしたんだ」
「一介の従者がクーデターを計画できるなどと本気で思ってるのか？上級士官だって同罪だ。反逆罪を疑って、我が衛兵の半数は殺し合いになった。真犯人はというと…主に最も近い人間が、クーデターを引き起こしたんだ」

languages.text: "Hizmetkâr başlarına darbe yapacak hâlleri yok ya! Kıdemli subaylar da onlar kadar suçlu. Korumalarımın yarısı, hain var diye birbirini katletti. Bu işin asıl sorumlusu... Hanımın en yakınında olanlar."
languages.original_text: "Did you really think mere servants could plan a coup? The senior officers are just as guilty, half of my guards butchered one another because they suspected treason. As for the real culprit... The coup was staged by those closest to the mistress."

traits.locale_text: "Hizmetkâr başlarına darbe yapacak hâlleri yok ya! Kıdemli subaylar da onlar kadar suçlu. Korumalarımın yarısı, hain var diye birbirini katletti. Bu işin asıl sorumlusu... Hanımın en yakınında olanlar."
